about.title: About Developer2U
about.subtitle: We believe modern projects require flexible, AI-powered expertise. That's exactly what we deliver.

mission.title: Developers aren't resources — they're partners.
mission.description: We are using modern AI tools during development to provide best quality and fast delivery. Our platform connects companies with experienced software developers who work on a project basis and use state-of-the-art AI tools and autonomous agents.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where companies can access top-tier development talent instantly, without the overhead of traditional hiring processes. Our platform eliminates bureaucracy and connects you directly with skilled professionals who can start contributing immediately.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Focus on AI competence and technical excellence

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Fair and open processes for both clients and developers

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing cutting-edge AI tools and methodologies

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Building lasting relationships, not just transactions

fastAccess.title: Fast Access

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle1: From idea to success in 3 days
process.subtitle2: You describe your needs — we deliver the right developer. No recruiting. No delays.

step1.title: Submit Request
step1.description: Describe your project or development needs.
step1.details: Tell us about your project requirements, timeline, and specific technologies you need. Our simple form makes it easy to communicate your vision.

step2.title: Matching
step2.description: We suggest the most suitable developers.
step2.details: Our team reviews your requirements and matches you with developers who have the right skills, experience, and availability for your project.

step3.title: Kickoff
step3.description: Start immediately — you will define your requirements.
step3.details: Once matched, you can start working with your developer right away. Define project scope, milestones, and communication preferences.

step4.title: Collaboration
step4.details: Work together using modern collaboration tools. Our developers leverage AI to enhance productivity and deliver high-quality results faster.

step5.title: Completion
step5.details: Review deliverables, provide feedback, and complete your project. Simple, transparent invoicing with no hidden fees.

fastTurnaround.title: Fast Turnaround
fastTurnaround.description: Get matched with developers in hours, not weeks
